meaningMnemonic: When you can't (<kanji>not</kanji>) <kanji>believe</kanji> in someone, it's because you <vocabulary>distrust</vocabulary> them. Maybe someone <vocabulary>discredit</vocabulary>ed them and now you <vocabulary>mistrust</vocabulary> everything they say.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
